Datasource.Parameter: (select geom,height::integer from test WHERE height::integer % 10 = 0 AND height::integer % 50 != 0 AND height::integer % 100 != 0) as "contours-10"
(select geom,height::integer from test WHERE height::integer % 50 = 0 AND height::integer % 100 != 0) as "contours-50"
(select geom,height::integer from test WHERE height::integer % 100 = 0) as "contours-100"
